column5: Anyone know of any used motorcycle sites?  other then the obvious kijiji, craigslist and ebay?  i'm not ruling out buying from the states, so us sites also...  any help is appreciated  looking for an 02+ v star 1100
My favorite site.Not all of them are for sale. http://www.pipeburn.com/ Joe
You and this HAWG . I can see it.LOL
GTA Motorcycle forum has a lot in classifieds.
Don't forget to repack the bearings on the training wheels...  http://toronto.bizcaf.ca/2003_Yamaha_V_Star_Classic_1100_-_%247995__Port_Credit_bizcafAd_704502.dhtml
Here is my fave but you won't find any yammies on it.  http://www.vintagegermanmotorcycles.com/
